definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: What sort of a customer is he?
sentences.chinese: 她是個很難打交道的滑頭傢伙。

sentences.english: We can't trust a person who often plays fast and loose.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能信任一個經常耍滑頭的人。

sentences.english: When liu town gimmick, lai with ginger both smoke to deal with the wound.
sentences.chinese: 柳時鎮耍滑頭，賴着姜暮煙爲自己處理傷口。

sentences.english: You are uncomfortable with the super-sophisticated and feel insecure in their company.
sentences.chinese: 你跟老滑頭在一起時會覺得很不舒服且缺少安全感。

sentences.english: Although your co-workers are trying to be forthright now, you're leery about your boss.
sentences.chinese: 雖然現在你的同事想要坦白，你卻對你的老闆耍滑頭。

sentences.english: Don't play tricks. I won't fall in your traps.
sentences.chinese: 你不要耍滑頭，我不會上你的當。

sentences.english: Nobody dares to play trick on him.
I played fox several times, pretending illness.
sentences.chinese: 我有幾次耍滑頭，假裝有病。

sentences.english: “But I am at the doctor’s right now,” he pleaded.
sentences.chinese: “可我正在醫生那兒，”他又耍滑頭了。

sentences.english: But the phone and cable companies are themselves being duplicitous.
sentences.chinese: 但電話和有線電視公司本身就是個滑頭。

sentences.english: He could hardly believe that his best friend had come the double on him.
sentences.chinese: 他簡直不相信他最好的朋友在對他耍滑頭。

definition: not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4
